verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* against \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \add and\add* against the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*.\f + \fr 50.1 \ft by…: Heb. by the hand of Jeremiah\f*

\w Declare|strong="H5046"\w* ye among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w publish|strong="H8085"\w*, and set \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w standard|strong="H5251"\w*; \w publish|strong="H8085"\w*, \add and\add* \w conceal|strong="H3582"\w* not: \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* is \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*, \w Bel|strong="H1078"\w* is \w confounded|strong="H3001"\w*, \w Merodach|strong="H4781"\w* is broken in \w pieces|strong="H2865"\w*; her \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* are \w confounded|strong="H3001"\w*, her \w images|strong="H1544"\w* are broken in \w pieces|strong="H2865"\w*.\f + \fr 50.2 \ft set up: Heb. lift up\f*

For out of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* there cometh \w up|strong="H5927"\w* a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* against her, which shall \w make|strong="H7896"\w* her \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w*, and none shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein: they shall \w remove|strong="H5110"\w*, they shall \w depart|strong="H1980"\w*, both \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*.

¶ In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and in that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, they and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w going|strong="H1980"\w* and \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w*: they shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

They shall \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* with their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \w thitherward|strong="H2008"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w Come|strong="H0935"\w*, and let us \w join|strong="H3867"\w* ourselves to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in a \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \add that\add* shall not be \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w*.

My \w people|strong="H5971"\w* hath been \w lost|strong="H0006"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*: their \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* have caused them to go \w astray|strong="H8582"\w*, they have turned them \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \add on\add* the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*: they have \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* from \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* to \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*, they have \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* their \w restingplace|strong="H7258"\w*.\f + \fr 50.6 \ft restingplace: Heb. place to lie down in\f*

All that \w found|strong="H4672"\w* them have \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* them: and their \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We \w offend|strong="H0816"\w* not, because they have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w* of \w justice|strong="H6664"\w*, even the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the \w hope|strong="H4723"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w Remove|strong="H5110"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, and be as the he \w goats|strong="H6260"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*.

¶ For, lo, I will \w raise|strong="H5782"\w* and cause to come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* an \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* of \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*: and they shall set themselves in \w array|strong="H6186"\w* against her; from thence she shall be \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*: their \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* \add shall be\add* as of a \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* expert \w man|strong="H7919"\w*; none shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* in \w vain|strong="H7387"\w*.\f + \fr 50.9 \ft expert…: or, destroyer\f*

And \w Chaldea|strong="H3778"\w* shall be a \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*: all that \w spoil|strong="H7997"\w* her shall be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Because ye were \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*, because ye \w rejoiced|strong="H5937"\w*, O ye \w destroyers|strong="H8154"\w* of mine \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w*, because ye are grown \w fat|strong="H6335"\w* as the \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w* at \w grass|strong="H1877"\w*, and \w bellow|strong="H6670"\w* as \w bulls|strong="H0047"\w*;\f + \fr 50.11 \ft fat: Heb. big, or, corpulent\f*\f + \fr 50.11 \ft bellow…: or, neigh as steeds\f*

Your \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* shall be \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*; she that \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* you shall be \w ashamed|strong="H2659"\w*: behold, the \w hindermost|strong="H0319"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, a dry \w land|strong="H6723"\w*, and a \w desert|strong="H6160"\w*.

Because of the \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* it shall not be \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*, but it shall be wholly \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*: every one that \w goeth|strong="H5674"\w* by \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* shall be \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w*, and \w hiss|strong="H8319"\w* at all her \w plagues|strong="H4347"\w*.

Put yourselves in \w array|strong="H6186"\w* against \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: all ye that \w bend|strong="H1869"\w* the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, \w shoot|strong="H3034"\w* at her, \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* no \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*: for she hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Shout|strong="H7321"\w* against her round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: she hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* her \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: her \w foundations|strong="H0803"\w* are \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*, her \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* are thrown \w down|strong="H2040"\w*: for it \add is\add* the \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: take \w vengeance|strong="H5358"\w* upon her; as she hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto her.

Cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w sower|strong="H2232"\w* from \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and him that \w handleth|strong="H8610"\w* the \w sickle|strong="H4038"\w* in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*: for \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w oppressing|strong="H3238"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* they shall \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and they shall \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to his own \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 50.16 \ft sickle: or, scythe\f*

¶ \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add is\add* a \w scattered|strong="H6340"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*; the \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* have driven \add him\add* \w away|strong="H5080"\w*: \w first|strong="H7223"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* hath \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* him; and \w last|strong="H0314"\w* this \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* hath broken his \w bones|strong="H6105"\w*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Behold, I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* and his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, as I have \w punished|strong="H6485"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.

And I will \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to his \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w*, and he shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* on \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w* and \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, and his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* upon \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* and \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.

In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and in that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be sought \w for|strong="H1245"\w*, and \add there shall be\add* none; and the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and they shall not be \w found|strong="H4672"\w*: for I will \w pardon|strong="H5545"\w* them whom I \w reserve|strong="H7604"\w*.

¶ Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Merathaim|strong="H4850"\w*, \add even\add* against it, and against the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Pekod|strong="H6489"\w*: \w waste|strong="H2717"\w* and utterly \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee.\f + \fr 50.21 \ft of Merathaim: or, of the rebels\f*\f + \fr 50.21 \ft Pekod: or, Visitation\f*
A \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \add is\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and of \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*.

How is the \w hammer|strong="H6360"\w* of the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* cut \w asunder|strong="H1438"\w* and \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*! how is \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* become a \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*!

I have laid a \w snare|strong="H3369"\w* for thee, and thou art also \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*, O \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and thou wast not \w aware|strong="H3045"\w*: thou art \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, and also \w caught|strong="H8610"\w*, because thou hast \w striven|strong="H1624"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* his \w armoury|strong="H0214"\w*, and hath brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* of his \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w*: for this \add is\add* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*.

\w Come|strong="H0935"\w* against her from the utmost \w border|strong="H7093"\w*, \w open|strong="H6605"\w* her \w storehouses|strong="H3965"\w*: cast her \w up|strong="H5549"\w* as \w heaps|strong="H6194"\w*, and destroy her \w utterly|strong="H2763"\w*: let nothing of her be \w left|strong="H7611"\w*.\f + \fr 50.26 \ft from…: Heb. from the end\f*\f + \fr 50.26 \ft cast…: or, tread her\f*

\w Slay|strong="H2717"\w* all her \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*; let them go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*: \w woe|strong="H1945"\w* unto them! for their \w day|strong="H3117"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of their \w visitation|strong="H6486"\w*.

The \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of them that \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* and escape \w out|strong="H6405"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, to \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* the \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* of his \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.

Call \w together|strong="H8085"\w* the \w archers|strong="H7228"\w* against \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: all ye that \w bend|strong="H1869"\w* the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, \w camp|strong="H2583"\w* against it round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*; let none thereof \w escape|strong="H6413"\w*: \w recompense|strong="H7999"\w* her according to her \w work|strong="H6467"\w*; according to all that she hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto her: for she hath been \w proud|strong="H2102"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, against the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Therefore shall her young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H7339"\w*, and all her \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H1826"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Behold, I \add am\add* against thee, \add O thou\add* most \w proud|strong="H2087"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: for thy \w day|strong="H3117"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \add that\add* I will \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* thee.\f + \fr 50.31 \ft most…: Heb. pride\f*

And the most \w proud|strong="H2087"\w* shall \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w* and \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, and none shall raise him \w up|strong="H6965"\w*: and I will \w kindle|strong="H3341"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in his \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and it shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* all round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him.\f + \fr 50.32 \ft the…: Heb. pride\f*

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; The \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add were\add* \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: and all that took them \w captives|strong="H7617"\w* held them \w fast|strong="H2388"\w*; they \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to let them \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.

Their \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w* \add is\add* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w*; the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: he shall \w throughly|strong="H7378"\w* \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* their \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*, that he may give \w rest|strong="H7280"\w* to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w disquiet|strong="H7264"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

¶ A \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \add is\add* upon the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and upon the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and upon her \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and upon her \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add men\add*.

A \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \add is\add* upon the \w liars|strong="H0907"\w*; and they shall \w dote|strong="H2973"\w*: a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \add is\add* upon her mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*; and they shall be \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*.\f + \fr 50.36 \ft liars: or, chief stays: Heb. bars\f*

A \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \add is\add* upon their \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, and upon their \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and upon all the mingled \w people|strong="H6153"\w* that \add are\add* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of her; and they shall become as \w women|strong="H0802"\w*: a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \add is\add* upon her \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*; and they shall be \w robbed|strong="H0962"\w*.

A \w drought|strong="H2721"\w* \add is\add* upon her \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*; and they shall be dried \w up|strong="H3001"\w*: for it \add is\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w*, and they are \w mad|strong="H1984"\w* upon \add their\add* \w idols|strong="H0367"\w*.

Therefore the wild beasts of the \w desert|strong="H6728"\w* with the wild beasts of the \w islands|strong="H0338"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \add there\add*, and the \w owls|strong="H1323"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein: and it shall be no more \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*; neither shall it be \w dwelt|strong="H7931"\w* in from \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* to \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.

As \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w overthrew|strong="H4114"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* and \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w* and the \w neighbour|strong="H7934"\w* \add cities\add* thereof, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \add so\add* shall no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* there, neither shall any \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* therein.

Behold, a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* shall be raised \w up|strong="H5782"\w* from the \w coasts|strong="H3411"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

They shall \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* and the \w lance|strong="H3591"\w*: they \add are\add* \w cruel|strong="H0394"\w*, and will not shew \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*: their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* shall \w roar|strong="H1993"\w* like the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and they shall \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* upon \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \add every one\add* put in \w array|strong="H6186"\w*, like a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, against thee, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w report|strong="H8088"\w* of them, and his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* waxed \w feeble|strong="H7503"\w*: \w anguish|strong="H6869"\w* took \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* of him, \add and\add* \w pangs|strong="H2427"\w* as of a woman in \w travail|strong="H3205"\w*.

Behold, he shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* like a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* from the \w swelling|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* unto the \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w* of the \w strong|strong="H0386"\w*: but I will \w make|strong="H7323"\w* them \w suddenly|strong="H7280"\w* run \w away|strong="H7323"\w* from her: and who \add is\add* a \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \add man, that\add* I may \w appoint|strong="H6485"\w* over her? for who \add is\add* like me? and who will appoint me the \w time|strong="H3259"\w*? and who \add is\add* that \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* that will \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me?\f + \fr 50.44 \ft appoint me…: or, convent me to plead?\f*

Therefore \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that he hath \w taken|strong="H3289"\w* against \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*; and his \w purposes|strong="H4284"\w*, that he hath \w purposed|strong="H2803"\w* against the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*: Surely the \w least|strong="H6810"\w* of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* shall draw them \w out|strong="H5498"\w*: surely he shall make \add their\add* \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* with them.

At the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w taking|strong="H8610"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* is \w moved|strong="H7493"\w*, and the \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* is \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.
